title: SEO indexing readiness polish
scope: Make sitemap/robots base URLs configurable via PUBLIC_SITE_URL
Add canonical and social meta tags to the SPA entry HTML
Align Next.js blog metadata and canonicals with the public site URL
Document public site URL env vars for frontend and blog builds
acceptance_criteria: Sitemap and robots.txt use the configured public site URL when provided
SPA entry HTML includes canonical and SEO meta tags with a configurable base URL
Next.js blog pages emit canonical URLs derived from NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL
New site URL environment variables are documented in .env.example
risk_notes: Misconfigured site URL will produce incorrect canonicals or sitemap links
SEO tags are only as accurate as their configured base URL
rollback_plan: Revert sitemap/robots changes to hardcoded URLs
Remove canonical/meta tags from frontend and Next blog templates
Delete the added public site URL environment variables
